item.title: 苹果收购以色列人工智能初创公司，该企业专注于面部动作解读技术
item.description: 苹果公司已收购以色列人工智能初创企业Q.ai，该公司专注于开发解读面部动作及理解无声交流的技术。【原文：Apple Inc. has acquired Israel-based artificial intelligence startup Q.ai, which develops technology for reading facial movements and understanding silent communication.】

item.title: 英伟达与梅赛德斯-奔驰推进自动驾驶出租车计划
item.description: 英伟达公司与合作伙伴梅赛德斯-奔驰集团正加速推进在主要市场推出无人驾驶出租车服务的计划，该服务将采用这家德国汽车制造商的S级车型。【原文：Nvidia Corp. and partner Mercedes-Benz Group AG are pushing ahead with plans to offer robotaxi services in major markets, using the German carmaker’s S-Class model.】

item.title: 信贷煤矿里的金丝雀正表现得有些反常
item.description: 您好，欢迎阅读本期通讯，这里汇集了Odd Lots世界每日精选内容。有时是我们——乔·韦森塔尔和特蕾西·阿洛威——为您解读市场、金融与经济领域的最新动态；有时则是来自我们专家嘉宾及信息源网络的深度贡献。无论内容形式如何，我们承诺始终为您带来精彩内容。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.description: 加文·纽森 摄影师：贾斯汀·沙利文/盖蒂图片社【原文：Gavin Newsom Photographer: Justin Sullivan/Getty Images】

item.title: 与特朗普家族有关联的加密货币公司计划斥资1亿美元回购股票
item.description: Alt5 Sigma Corp.是一家与特朗普家族加密货币项目有关联的金融科技公司，其股票交易量较低。该公司已批准最高1亿美元的股票回购计划，足以回购多达5000万股股票。【原文：Alt5 Sigma Corp., a thinly traded financial-technology firm with ties to a Trump family crypto venture, authorized a share buyback of up to $100 million, enough to repurchase as many as 50 million shares.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉修订石油法案将减税以吸引投资者
item.description: 委内瑞拉修订后的石油改革法案将大幅减轻该国财政负担，赋予官员广泛的税收和特许权使用费调整权限，旨在吸引私人资本重返饱受重创的石油行业。根据最新草案显示，该法案最早将于周四进行讨论并可能获得批准。【原文：Venezuela’s revised oil reform bill would sharply ease the country’s fiscal burden, giving officials broad discretion to adjust taxes and royalties in a bid to attract private capital back into the battered industry, according to the latest draft set to be discussed and potentially approved as soon as Thursday.】

item.title: 迪尔股价飙升至历史新高，交易员撤离科技巨头
item.description: 约翰迪尔公司股价盘中短暂触及历史新高，为本轮涨势画上句号。随着降息举措和强劲的美国经济增长推动投资者涌入与经济健康状况密切相关的市场板块，该公司股价持续攀升。【原文：Deere & Co. shares briefly touched an intraday record high, capping off a rally that’s come as interest-rate cuts and strong US growth push investors into sectors of the market closely linked to the health of the economy.】

item.title: 帝亚吉欧东非公司半年利润跃升38%，得益于成本降低
item.description: 东非酿酒公司上半年利润连续第二年攀升，得益于财务成本下降提振了这家帝亚吉欧旗下公司的盈利。【原文：East African Breweries Plc’s first-half profit climbed for the second consecutive year as lower finance costs boosted earnings for the Diageo Plc unit.】

item.title: 金银价格持续飙升。原因何在？关注要点何在？
item.description: 金银价格在新年伊始便势不可挡，接连刷新纪录，令经验丰富的交易员和分析师震惊不已，并引发了异常剧烈的价格波动。【原文：Gold and silver’s relentless start to a year has taken out record after record, shocked seasoned traders and analysts, and driven exceptional price volatility.】

item.title: 得州数据中心与加密货币矿工在风暴期间降低用电量
item.description: 德克萨斯州电力可靠性委员会主席比尔·弗洛雷斯周四表示，在近期冬季风暴导致该州及全美多地电网承压期间，部分数据中心和加密货币矿工主动削减了用电量。【原文：Electric Reliability Council of Texas Chairman Bill Flores said Thursday that some data centers and cryptocurrency miners voluntarily curtailed power use during the recent winter storm that strained the state’s grid and others across the country.】

item.title: 特朗普称下周将公布美联储主席提名
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普表示，他将于"下周"宣布美联储主席提名人选，并重申期待这位央行新掌门人降息。【原文：President Donald Trump said he would announce his nominee to chair the Federal Reserve “next week,” and reiterated his expectation that the central bank’s new leader will lower interest rates.】

item.title: 保险平台Ethos在美国公开发行中股价下跌15%
item.description: 保险平台Ethos Technologies Inc.在首次公开募股中筹集约2亿美元后，其股票在上市首日一度暴跌15%。【原文：Insurance platform Ethos Technologies Inc. shares dropped as much as 15% in its trading debut, after the company and some of its shareholders raised roughly $200 million in an initial public offering.】

item.title: 橡树资本为常青贷款基金的早期投资者提供折扣
item.description: 知情人士透露，橡树资本管理公司正通过向早期参与者提供费用折扣，试图吸引投资者加入其首个常青直接贷款基金。【原文：Oaktree Capital Management is seeking to attract investors to its first evergreen direct lending fund by offering fee discounts to early participants, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧盟就外部国家受益于乌克兰贷款的费用展开辩论
item.description: 欧盟即将就乌克兰如何使用该集团提供的900亿欧元（1080亿美元）贷款达成协议，重点涉及非欧盟国家如何参与使用该贷款资金的采购活动。【原文：The European Union is nearing an agreement on how Ukraine can use the proceeds from a €90 billion ($108 billion) loan from the bloc, particularly with regard to how non-EU countries can participate in purchases that use funds from the loan.】

item.title: 黑石集团支持的Liftoff Mobile寻求在美国IPO募资7.62亿美元
item.description: Liftoff Mobile公司是一家由黑石集团支持的企业，致力于在移动应用程序中投放广告。该公司正计划通过首次公开募股筹集高达7.62亿美元的资金。【原文：Liftoff Mobile Inc., a Blackstone Inc.-backed company that helps place ads within mobile applications, is seeking to raise as much as $762 million in an initial public offering.】

item.title: 前贝莱德投资者加入哈德逊湾公司推动私募信贷业务
item.description: 知情人士透露，哈德逊湾资本管理公司已聘请一支前贝莱德公司高管团队，为这家管理着200亿美元资产的机构启动新的私募信贷策略。【原文：Hudson Bay Capital Management brought on a team of ex-BlackRock Inc. executives to start a new private credit strategy for the $20 billion money manager, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率小幅攀升，30年期贷款利率升至6.1%
item.description: 美国抵押贷款利率连续第二周上涨，因购房需求持续低迷。【原文：Mortgage rates in the US rose for a second week as demand from buyers remains sluggish.】

item.title: 参议院农业委员会推进加密货币市场法案
item.description: 参议院农业委员会以党派投票方式推进了其版本的数字资产市场结构法案，而另一委员会的关键议员们仍在就这项争议性法案的具体条款进行磋商。【原文：The Senate Agriculture Committee advanced its version of digital asset market structure legislation on a party-line vote, as key lawmakers on another panel continue to negotiate their piece of the contentious bill.】

item.title: Carvana股价反弹，分析师力挺公司抵御做空者
item.description: 卡瓦纳公司股价在大幅抛售后反弹，此前做空机构哥谭研究发布报告指控该公司虚报收益，华尔街分析师随即纷纷为这家在线二手车经销商的业务辩护。【原文：Carvana Co. shares bounced back from a steep selloff after Wall Street analysts rushed to defend the online used-car dealer’s business following a report from short seller Gotham City Research that accused the company of overstating earnings.】

item.title: 特朗普政府考虑对委内瑞拉石油实施透明化管理
item.description: 美国官方出口信贷机构负责人表示，特朗普政府仍在研究如何确保委内瑞拉石油销售收入的财务透明度。【原文：President Donald Trump’s administration is still working out how to ensure financial transparency for proceeds from sales of Venezuelan oil, according to the head of the official US export credit agency.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚最大管道运营商将为新建进口终端启动全球液化天然气招标
item.description: 哥伦比亚最大的管道运营商计划启动全球招标，为其正在建设的进口终端确保液化天然气的长期供应。【原文：Colombia’s largest pipeline operator plans to launch a global tender to secure long-term supplies of liquefied natural gas for an import terminal it’s constructing.】

item.title: 阿瑞斯签署16亿美元私募贷款以支持埃弗马克交易
item.description: 据周四声明显示，阿瑞斯管理公司旗下信贷基金牵头完成了一笔16亿美元的私募债务融资，用于支持苏瓦品牌公司与艾丽达美业的合并。【原文：Ares Management Corp. credit funds have led a $1.6 billion private debt financing to support the merger of Suave Brands Company and Elida Beauty, according to a statement Thursday.】

item.title: 美国检方起诉First Brands创始人帕特里克·詹姆斯
item.description: 去年这家破产的汽车零部件制造商倒闭后，First Brands集团创始人帕特里克·詹姆斯及其兄弟爱德华（该公司前高管）被纽约联邦检察官提起公诉。【原文：First Brands Group founder Patrick James and his brother Edward, a former executive at the company, were indicted by federal prosecutors in New York following the collapse of the bankrupt auto-parts maker last year.】

item.title: 瑞克·里德尔角逐美联储职位，令其在贝莱德的明星ETF前景蒙上阴影
item.description: 贝莱德公司正面临一个罕见的困境：其明星基金经理可能即将被挖角担任美联储主席，这为规模达14万亿美元的交易所交易基金行业中增长最快的主动型债券基金前景蒙上阴影。【原文：BlackRock Inc. is facing a rare conundrum: its star manager may soon be poached to head the Federal Reserve, clouding the outlook for the $14 trillion exchange-traded fund industry’s fastest-growing active bond vehicle.】

item.title: 西门子超越SAP成为德国市值最高企业
item.description: 西门子股份公司以市值计成为德国最大企业，超越了SAP SE。此前这家软件公司的股价因销售前景令人失望而暴跌。【原文：Siemens AG became Germany’s largest company by market value, overtaking SAP SE after the software firm’s shares plunged following a disappointing sales outlook.】

item.title: 尼日尔袭击事件危及奥拉诺矿址开采的铀资源
item.description: 袭击尼日尔首都的武装分子曾危险地接近一处铀矿储备点，该矿原属法国奥拉诺公司。【原文：Attackers who staged an assault on Niger’s capital came dangerously close to a stockpile of uranium removed from French company Orano SA’s mine.】

item.title: 瑞士力争豁免欧盟钢铁贸易壁垒
item.description: 瑞士召集欧盟贸易官员举行特别会议，力争豁免于欧盟对钢铁进口的保护性措施。【原文：Switzerland called a special meeting with European Union trade officials, pushing to be exempt from the bloc’s protective measures on steel imports.】

item.title: 加拿大与韩国承诺深化汽车制造业合作
item.description: 加拿大和韩国政府承诺将探讨将韩国汽车制造业引入加拿大的可能性，作为深化两国工业合作更广泛努力的一部分。【原文：The Canadian and South Korean governments promised to look at bringing Korean auto manufacturing to Canada as part of a broader effort to deepen industrial cooperation.】

item.title: 蓝猫投资者从科技主题基金撤出15.4%资产
item.description: 投资者从蓝猫资本公司旗下某科技主题基金中赎回了约15.4%的净资产，此前该基金在本月初大幅提高了投资者可赎回的金额上限。【原文：Investors pulled around 15.4% of net assets from one of Blue Owl Capital Inc.’s tech-focused funds, following the vehicle’s decision to dramatically increase the amount investors could withdraw earlier this month.】

item.title: 研究显示新冠疫情导致富裕国家死亡人数持续攀升
item.description: 疫情不仅提前了死亡时间。根据对34个国家数据的分析，在新冠疫情肆虐的大多数富裕国家，死亡率出现了持续上升，且这种上升趋势尚未完全消退。【原文：The pandemic didn’t just pull deaths forward in time. In most rich nations, Covid-19 left a lasting increase in mortality that has yet to fully unwind, according to an analysis of data from 34 countries.】
